Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Whale' (2022), what influenced Darren Aronofsky's decision to cast Brendan Fraser as Charlie?
Options:
A. Darren Aronofsky saw Brendan Fraser's performance in a trailer for 'Journey to the End of the Night' (2006)
B. Brendan Fraser had previously worked with Darren Aronofsky on another film
C. Darren Aronofsky was impressed by Brendan Fraser's acting skills in a live performance
D. Brendan Fraser's physical transformation for the role was a key factor in the casting decision
Correct Answer: Darren Aronofsky saw Brendan Fraser's performance in a trailer for 'Journey to the End of the Night' (2006)
